name: Can You Escape Baby Panda Games
name_original: Can You Escape Baby Panda Games
description:
Welcome to Can You Escape - Baby Panda !

Do you think you have the skills with Can You Escape – Baby Panda - a cool escape game?

Can You Escape – Baby Panda is a point and click escape game. A panda cub has been caught and put in a cage. The mother panda cannot bear the separation of her baby. Hence, help the panda baby escape from the cage and unite with its mother. Collect objects and relate them to solve the puzzles. Have fun!

Game features:

Genuine story!
Innovative puzzles!
Stunning graphics!
Realistic atmosphere!


'Wow! This Game Is Just Amazing! Excitement All The Way!'
'This Free Game Exceeded My Expectations! Download Now!'
'Downright Fun! My Kid Can't Stop Playing It!'
'I Love It When I Reach The Bottom And Catch The Bag Of Gold!'
